remarks: The covers relation is not transitive.  ( ~ atcv0eq analog.) (Contributed by NM, 29-Nov-2011.)
statement:
atcvr0eq.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atcvr0eq.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atcvr0eq.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
atcvr0eq.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atcvr0eq $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( .0. C ( P .\/ Q ) <-> P = Q ) ) $.
